DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effects of a mindfulness-based meditation intervention on quality of life, sleep and mood in adolescents with cancer compared to a control group.
DOC.brief_title: Mindfulness-based Intervention for Teenagers With Cancer
DOC.criteria: Teenagers (ages 1218) with cancer No ongoing or lifetime severe psychopathology, such as schizophrenia, psychosis, delusional disorders or organic mental disorders
